numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I notice that a majority of 15-24 year olds are convinced that newer generations make the world a better place.
3. I wonder if the people who think that the world is changing and becoming better will do something to change the world.
4. I do not say that this relates to me very much.
5. I hear people talking about the world.
6. Most of these people say that the world is getting worse.
7. The headline is: The world is changing?
